        public static java.lang.String addition(java.lang.String numberOne,
                                        java.lang.String numberTwo)
        This method gets the result of the addition between two numbers. Pre: The numbers are rational numbers in String type. Post: The result was gotten.
        Parameters:
        numberOne. - A number. Cannot be empty or null.
        numberTwo. - A number. Cannot be empty or null.
        Returns:
        A string with the addition between numberOne and numberTwo.

        numberTwo. - The degree of the root. Cannot be empty or null. Cannot be negative.

        Parameters:
        numberOne. - The denominator. Cannot be empty or null.
        numberTwo. - The numerator. Cannot be empty or null.
        piValidator. - A number which validates the addition of pi to the number.
        Returns:
        A String with the conversion in degrees of the angle.

      • exponentiationForOps

        public static double exponentiationForOps(double accumulation,
